thread.section_title: Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Another great stay.... thanks
thread.title_full: Another great stay.... thanks - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Derek H
title: Another great stay.... thanks
text:
Back in London again for a weekend and booked a further stay at the Radisson, again not disappointed. From checking in to out, the staff very helpful and courteous.
Had lunch again in their restaurant Scoff & Banter, great quality and good selection of wines as well. Might even try their afternoon tea next time, as it did look good.
Great room again overlooking the square, very spacious and clean. If you're looking for that little bit more with your stay, I would recommend the Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire
